Flub.Name: Passes
Flub.Description: Number of occlusion passes. Higher passes provide more detail while being densely packed. Try using higher Power and Multiplier before increasing number of passes.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: The strength of the occlusion. Higher values occlude large geological features such as valleys and gullies, while lower values occlude crevices and smaller features.

Flub.Name: Multiplier
Flub.Description: Multiplies the power. Default value works in most situations, but you can use it to fine tune the power or increase it to immense levels.
